title: The Village of round and square houses
brief_description: Based on a folktale about a village in Central Africa situated in the forest at the base of an active volcano. At the bottom of Naka Mountain is the Tos Village where the women live in round houses and the men live in square house. This film explains some of the villager’s customs, as well as how they came to live in their separate societies. Based on the book by Ann Grifalconi.
